Projects.title: Platzi Conf
Projects.description: This is a clothes store made using React Js and React Hooks. I used Paypal API for the payments and Google Maps API so you can see where tha pack will be delivered

Projects.title: Disney Plus Clone
Projects.description: This is a Disney Plus Clone, that I made with React, React Router, and Styled Component. You can Log in with your Google account. All the Images, titles, and descriptions the app is getting from an API that I made

Projects.title: Movie App
Projects.description: This is a Movie App, that I made with React, React Router, and CSS. You can see all the movies, TV series that exist, their score and more! I used an API to get all the information, photos, descriptions, etc

Projects.title: Beverage Recipe Finder
Projects.description: This is a website where you can look for any kind of drink and you can see the ingredients

Projects.title: Crypto Coins
Projects.description: On this website, you can check the different prices of the top crypto coins in real time

Projects.title: Weather App
Projects.description: This app tells you the weather in every city in the world. I used an API and the background changes depending on the weather of the city selected.
Projects.github: This app tells you the weather in every city in the world. I used an API and the background changes depending on the weather of the city selected.
